attributes.action: A 2016 general election for a no confidence vote in the Tory party after Brexit
attributes.background: David Cameron has failed to keep the UK in the European Union.  Both camps have lied while campaigning.  The general public voted for David Cameron.  Now he has decided to step down,  there must be a general election to decide the fait of the Tory party.  The worse prime minister in a 100 years.
